des: "This quick and easy sauce is wonderful on ice cream or pancakes.  I make a double recipe to freeze and enjoy all winter."
ins: Mash the strawberries with a potato masher in a pot. Stir the lemon juice, sugar, cornstarch, and salt into the mashed strawberries. Place the pot over medium heat. Stirring constantly, bring the mixture to a boil; remove immediately from the heat and allow to cool to room temperature.
